name: Maxima
description:
Maxima


Since Reggie is Dutch he couldn't help naming a cape after one of his country's most stylish women, princess Maxima. And this off-white cape will make you feel like royalty. It's what Paris Hilton would wear if she was a bit classier. Tiny dog and flashy designer bag is optional. Made from a wool-mix fabric, this cape is soft and warm enough to wear in the winter. The capes are all one size. Their cut is lower in the front and longer in the back, which is flattering for all shapes. It's possible to customize your cape depending on your mood. The collar is cut as a scarf and can be worn in a knot or simply thrown over the shoulder for a timeless style.

name: Diana
description:
Diana


Turn heads in this soft and warm strawberry red cape, inspired by none other than one of the original divas, Diana Ross. It's not for the faint-hearted. Accessorise with red lips and high heels and people will be wondering who you are. Made from a wool-mix fabric, this cape is soft and warm enough to wear in the winter. The capes are all one size. Their cut is lower in the front and longer in the back, which is flattering for all shapes. It's possible to customize your cape depending on your mood. The collar is cut as a scarf and can be worn in a knot or simply thrown over the shoulder for a timeless style.

name: Anais
description:
Anais


This Anais cape is for all of you writers or wannabe writers out there. Inspired by Anais Nin who lived a lot, loved a lot and wrote diaries about it all. She was also very style conscious and made sure everything from her underwear to her gloves was matching.
Anais was an inspiration to those around her, which wasn't an easy thing to pull of in the artsy expat community in 1930s Paris. Made from a wool-mix fabric, this cape is soft and warm enough to wear in the winter. The capes are all one size. Their cut is lower in the front and longer in the back, which is flattering for all shapes. It's possible to customize your cape depending on your mood. The collar is cut as a scarf and can be worn in a knot or simply thrown over the shoulder for a timeless style.

name: Isadora
description:
Isadora


Isadora Duncan was one of the most famous dancers in the world. She left audiences in awe and broke down barriers with her free-slowing and emotional style. She often wore greek inspired dresses on stage and danced bare-foot. This cape is a tribute to her. Made from a wool-mix fabric, this cape is soft and warm enough to wear in the winter. The capes are all one size. Their cut is lower in the front and longer in the back, which is flattering for all shapes. It's possible to customize your cape depending on your mood. The collar is cut as a scarf and can be worn in a knot or simply thrown over the shoulder for a timeless style.

name: Grace
description:
Grace


Grace Kelly was a real princess and she was considered to be one of the pretties women of her time. Even today her style lives on (we've heard Betty Draper's look in Mad Men was isnpired by Kelly). This classy cape was inspired by her and adds a timeless look to almost every outfit. Made from a wool-mix fabric, this cape is soft and warm enough to wear in the winter. The capes are all one size. Their cut is lower in the front and longer in the back, which is flattering for all shapes. It's possible to customize your cape depending on your mood. The collar is cut as a scarf and can be worn in a knot or simply thrown over the shoulder for a timeless style.
